thread.title: After Hours: Metro Edge mixer at Blue Prynt
thread.title_full: After Hours: Metro Edge mixer at Blue Prynt

author: Tia Gemmell
title: After Hours: Metro Edge mixer at Blue Prynt
text:
Metro Edge hosted a mixer at Blue Prynt Restaurant and Bar on July 14th. Metro Edge hosted its monthly mixer at Blue Prynt Restaurant and Bar on July 14. The event included meet and greet for young professionals and an interactive game where each attendee wore a sticker with the name of a famous individual on their back. Attendees had to mingle and ask other people questions to try and figure out who their character was. Look through the slideshow for names and faces from the event.
